rules.name: myRule_1
rules.label: only if BAC, PFG, PSG and Credit Opportunities

Flow.description: - SS: 4.8.19: updated to add PSG research opty -To create a Brookfield Opportunity when an Opportunity is created (Create new fix).

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3

value.stringValue:
AND ( OR ( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName) ) ,
OR( TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = "3: Meetings/calls held with Inv Team", TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = "4: Fund due diligence", TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = "5: IC approved", TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = "6: Legal review", TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = "7: Approved", TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = "8: Closed", TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = "Firm Decline" ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_5
formulas.expression:
AND ( OR ( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName}) ) ,
OR( TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = "3: Meetings/calls held with Inv Team", TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = "4: Fund due diligence", TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = "5: IC approved", TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = "6: Legal review", TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = "7: Approved", TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = "8: Closed", TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = "Firm Decline" ) )

Flow.label: Create Brookfield Opportunity
